entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -7.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 9:00 AM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C

Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 91 %

Dewpoint: -9.0°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
